sentences.english: Ischemic colitis commonly occurs in the elderly and has a wide clinical spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的虚血性大肠炎发生在老年人。

sentences.english: To the diarrhoea enteritis patient of gentamicin allergy , with what injection cure?

sentences.english: OhjectiveTo study the anti - acute gastroenteritis effect of Nuerfeng Lialiao Water extract (NLWE) of mouse.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究牛耳枫与辣蓼提取物的抗急性胃肠炎的作用。

sentences.english: You also mentioned that you suffered from ulcerated colitis. Are you currently taking prescribed medication?
sentences.chinese: 你也提到，因溃疡结肠炎。你目前正在用药物吗？

sentences.english: Pseudomembranous colitis has been reported with topical clindamycin.
sentences.chinese: 局部用克林霉素有报道可致假膜性结肠炎。

sentences.english: The Diagnostic Methods of Mink Viral Enteritis is reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对水貂病毒性肠炎诊断方法进行了阐述。

sentences.english: May be associated with proctitis and a variety of pathogenic microorganisms on the invasion of the intestinal tract.
sentences.chinese: 可能与直肠炎及多种病原微生物对肠道的侵袭有关。

sentences.english: I am not quite sure, I hope for you a little help.
sentences.chinese: 急性肠炎，我不太清楚，希望对你有点帮助。

sentences.english: Darling got enteritis, what should notice on food?
sentences.chinese: 宝宝得了肠炎，在饮食上要注意什么？

sentences.english: Gastroenteritis can be met by a person, there will be a series of knock-on effect.
sentences.chinese: 可遇上了一个胃肠炎的人，便会产生一连串连锁反应。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a better treatment to cure chronic enteritis in weaned monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索断奶仔猴慢性肠炎的较优治疗方案。

sentences.english: The germ can lead to a condition called colitis.
It has two distinct presentations, acute hemorrhagic enteritis and non-suppurative myocarditis.
sentences.chinese: 以急性出血性肠炎和非化脓性心肌炎为特征。

sentences.english: Give a summarization about traditional chinese medicine's cure development of Ulcerous colon disease.
sentences.chinese: 就近年来中医药治疗溃疡性结肠炎进展情况进行综述。

sentences.english: Results The drip-type enema retention enema treatment more effective than proctitis.
sentences.chinese: 结果滴注式灌肠治疗直肠炎效果优于保留灌肠。

sentences.english: Proctitis is common in patients undergoing pelvic radiation therapy .
sentences.chinese: 直肠炎常见于骨盆放射治疗的病人。

definition: (coll.) to have diarrhea/to shrink back/to cower
